name: fully
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: fully
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: Have you fully recovered from your illness?
I fully intended to call you last night.
example.egtrans: 昨天晚上我非常想给你打电话。

example.eg: I'm sorry, the restaurant is fully booked.
example.egtrans: 对不起，餐馆的座位已经预订满了。
我对这一问题有完全的了解。

dsense.name: fully
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尽可能地；完全地；充分地

example.eg: Kate has always participated fully in the life of the school.
example.egtrans: 凯特一直是彻底地融入到了学校生活中。

example.eg: He cooperated fully with the police.

name: -fully
posTip: A letter or group of letters added to the end of a word to make a new word.

trans_examp.trans_en: in a way that shows the stated quality
